I'd like to confirm this torrent as working, in English. You just have to go into the /res/gamedata/ folder, open language.mbjr in notepad, and replace the number 8 with the number 0. I can't find any LAN support built in though.

@Ciahast Because it was only released in the US, not the UK.  The best crackers (such as Skidrow) are in the UK so we're mostly getting people who bought the game uploading it to this site.  In other words, mostly noobs.

Check back tomorrow for a real SKIDROW upload.  They don't upload until they have the crack made for it, they can't crack it until it appears on Steam and it will not come up on Steam in the UK until the 4th of November.
this fw version is corrupt, thats why its crashing for some people. the video partiton is corrupted, the t.p version seems to be working, i just havent found it yet?!

Yes is works.  So far, I'm not finding any glitches, except for Aragorn in the first scene is black when you talk to him.  I've played for an hour after that and still nothing.  I do not see any graphic problems, I put everything to maximum at first then reduced it to low in game, it does get worse so there are no graphical problems (if that's what everyone meant).  And the game does lag during loading screens (like the picture is moving and it skips a bit, no big deal).  No crashes so far, for those who do have it, try running the game in Admin.  In previous games I've played, the game would crash unless I ran it in Admin.  So from now on I just do that by default.  Also, I'm not fully sure, but I think there might be some kind of virus in this torrent.  Now I know it's just a false positive when AVG says there is a virus upon running the game.  But when I got off to write this, it took about 15 minutes to open Firefox (it was soooooooooooooo slow) and now my Firefox is so fucked up, my tool bar is missing along with addons and all I see is the URL box.  Hopefully when I restart my computer it will be fixed.  It's still taking a while to go between sites, about 5 minutes.  But all in all, the torrent does work.
